about_the_game:
Vaccine Zombies is a horror survival and save-the-world game. You are in a virus/vaccine nightmare that includes aliens as well as zombies.

Features:

  • Horror Survival: Navigate a world overrun with terrifying enemies including zombies, aliens, and infected humans. Fight for your life using everything you can find.

  • Mysterious Conspiracy: Uncover the origins of the virus, the vaccine, and the extraterrestrial connection. What are they really after?

  • Immersive World: From a desolate vaccine zombie colony to an island research facility, explore the ruins of a world on the brink of collapse.

  • Soundtrack: Original music written by award-winning songwriters for this game. It sets the tone and mood for important scenes and leaves you with memorable melodies.

  • Action-Packed Combat: Engage in intense combat against zombies and alien creatures. Your weapon choices are critical to your survival.

  • Critical Decisions: Every decision impacts the future. Will you trust those around you, or will you have to go it alone?

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes the killing of zombies and aliens with an array of weapons (knife, cleaver, baseball bat, axe, pistol, and shotgun.) The goal of the fighting is to save yourself and humanity. There is a simple blood-splattering effect during the fighting. There is no nudity or sexual content. There is no profanity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 8th Generation Intel
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with DirectX 10 support and 2GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-Compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 10th Generation
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with DirectX 11 support and 8GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-Compatible sound card

short_description: You are sent to a Vaccine Zombie colony because you have developed early symptoms of the illness that will soon make you a zombie. You may need to eliminate hundreds of zombies to find the antidote. If successful, your mission will be extended to destroy the aliens that started this.
